message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. It comes with exceptional features that can greatly enhance your daily routine. I am offering it to you for $120. I believe this price reflects its true value and the benefits it can bring to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking for something within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and I'm willing to negotiate. I would like to offer the product to you for $105. This price still reflects the value of the product while being more accessible to your budget.
